code: import{Server,Model}from'miragejs';import addRoutesToMockServer from'./addRoutesToMockServer';import getUsers from'./users';var mockServer=new Server({models:{users:Model},seeds:function seeds(server){getUsers.data.forEach(function(user){server.schema.users.create(user);});}});addRoutesToMockServer(mockServer);export default mockServer;
